title: European Women In Tech 2023
description: Another conference! This time, however, I experienced things in a COMPLETELY different way.
content: Another conference! This time, however, I experienced things in a COMPLETELY different way.

title: 𝑻𝒊𝒎𝒆 𝒎𝒂𝒏𝒂𝒈𝒆𝒎𝒆𝒏𝒕 𝒓𝒆𝒍𝒊𝒆𝒔 𝒉𝒆𝒂𝒗𝒊𝒍𝒚 𝒐𝒏 𝒄𝒐𝒎𝒎𝒖𝒏𝒊𝒄𝒂𝒕𝒊𝒐𝒏 !
description: 𝗘𝗶𝘇𝗼 𝗞𝗼𝗯𝗮𝘆𝗮𝘀𝗵𝗶, Chairperson and Director of ITOCHU Corporation (Trading company) believes Communication is an
content: 𝗘𝗶𝘇𝗼 𝗞𝗼𝗯𝗮𝘆𝗮𝘀𝗵𝗶, Chairperson and Director of ITOCHU Corporation (Trading company) believes Communication is an important part of Time management.  I can totally correlate this to Not only at high levels But also on our daily activities. Just, for example, We spend a lot of time chatting with people friends’ colleagues, and others which takes a lot of time, which can be managed with simple calls (which will have emotional connect as well).
